page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS
page.content: A teenager of 19 was found dead in bed at Glaisdale Gardens by his brother.He had complained about the tablets he had to take.His mother said he had been diagnosed as a schizophreniac at the age of 15.The coroner said that he had died of heart failure and an overdose of tablets.He recorded a verdict of suicide. Two Wolverhampton policemen are taking part in a 3 month experiment to get to know the people on their beat.People from Low Hill will be able to tell their problems to the police at Low Hill Community Centre. Policemen are hunting 2 jogging muggers who ran behind a 16 year old youth in Showell Road and pushed him to the ground.He was robbed of training shoes and a radio cassette.He was attacked at 10p.m. on May 17th 1985.
